casebody.data:
Carmine PIETROMALA, Plaintiff in Error, v. UNITED STATES, Defendant in Error. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. December 7, 1925.) No. 111. John B. Johnston, of New York City, for plaintiff in error. Emory R. Buckner, U. S. Atty., of New York City (William D. Whitney, Sp. Asst. U. S. Atty., of New York City, of counsel), for the United States.

Before ROGERS, HAND, and MACK, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
